Package de.lessvoid.nifty.render.batch.spi.core

Class CoreMatrix4f

java.lang.Object
de.lessvoid.nifty.render.batch.spi.core.CoreMatrix4f
public class CoreMatrix4f extends Object
Represents a 4x4 floating point matrix.
